channel.title: Need a 24/7 hoster!

hi guys i need a 24/7 hoster and i will give you owner if you do it my msn is [email]kiriako13@live.co.uk[/email]

If your gona host for me promise you wont steal the server files must be atelast 20/7+ If you host you will get: Owner with me choose 2 ppl for mod and admin Code with me and other stuff
